title: The signal of the  WLAN is weak or unstable. Whyï¼Ÿ
answer:
The possible reasons and solutions are as follows:
(1) There is strong magnetic field or radio waves in the nearby area that interferences the wireless network. It is recommended to keep the HG away from appliances with strong electromagnetic fields,
(2) Place the HG in the open area to avoid the wireless signal attenuation caused by the obstacles, such as concrete wall and board wall,
(3) Your computer is too far away from the HG. Shorten the distance between your computer and the HG,
(4) A thunder-storm may affect wireless signals. It is recommended to use the wireless function in a comparatively good weather.
